spec_data.Name: gap-pkg-radiroot
spec_data.Description:
This package can compute and display an expression by radicals for the
roots of a solvable, rational polynomial.  Related to this it is
possible to create the Galois group and the splitting field of a
rational polynomial.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:23:38 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Compute radicals for roots of solvable rational polynomials
